name: Milk is Quantum
description:
Milk is Quantum is a puzzle game in which you play as a cute cat trying to reach its beloved milk, and you are making your own rules! 

Rules are present in the game as interacting blocks: moving them you will create new mechanisms for each level! You may say at this point: “wait, but I already know this game, it’s Baba is you” ! Well… yes, but actually, no. In Milk is Quantum, you’re in a world that follows the strange and exotic rules of Quantum Mechanics. Explore concepts like Quantum Superposition, Quantum Measurement, and Entanglement, by yourself, literally building them from… blocks! 

Move with WASD, measure (you will get what a measurement is playing) with F and restart with R, that's all you need to know! Go drink that Qilk!!
